author: Staff Reporter
text:
A few residents who had lost their houses, shops to an eviction drive near the G.P. Signal junction on Sathyamangalam Road staged a protest on Tuesday.

According to sources, around 20 people, including nine women from 11 families, staged a protest along the Sathyamangalam Road alleging that the corporation had removed them from the place they had been using for long.

Coimbatore Corporation sources said that a few days ago, the civic body had removed 15 shops on a land that was classified ‘Revenue Poromboke’ to facilitate the shifting of temples from Gandhipuram Junction.

The temple shifting was part of the work to speed up the flyover construction.

They also said that if the residents had lost their houses they could represent to the civic body.
title: Demonstration held
